revision.comment: Protected Template:Non-free fair use rationale: [[WP:HRT|frequently transcluded template]], tempting target for vandalism [edit=sysop:move=sysop]
Happy-melon's category= method, do not include template in categories
revision.text:
[[Image:Gamepad.svg|64px|Copyrighted]]
This image is '''cover art''' for a '''[[video game|video]]''' or '''[[computer game]]''', and the copyright for it is most likely owned by either the game's publisher or developer. It is believed that the use of low-resolution images of game cover art *to illustrate the '''packaging of the game in question''' *on the [[en:wikipedia:Main Page| English-language Wikipedia]], hosted on servers in the United States by the non-profit [http://wikimediafoundation.org Wikimedia Foundation], constitutes '''[[fair use]]''' under [[United States copyright law]]. '''Other uses of this image, on Wikipedia or elsewhere, might be [[copyright infringement]]'''. See [[Wikipedia:Non-free content]] for more information. '''To the uploader''': please add a detailed '''[[Wikipedia:Non-free use rationale guideline|fair use rationale]]''' for each use, as well as the '''source''' of the work and copyright information.{{#if:{{{1|}}}||
Additionally, please specify '''at least one platform''' in the first parameter. See usage below.}} ----
'''Usage:'''
This template accepts the platform(s) as parameter to better categorize the tagged image. 
{{Non-free game cover|Macintosh|Linux|Windows}}
or 
{{Non-free game cover|Macintosh}}
or just 
{{Non-free game cover}}
if the platform is unknown.
{{#ifeq:{{{1}}}|PC|
Possible tagging error: this image has been tagged as a "PC" game cover. This should only be done if it is for an ''unidentifiable'' personal computer platform. If the cover says "PC-CD/DVD-ROM", it most likely means ''Windows''.|}}
{{{category| {{Non-free media}} [[Category:{{{1|Video}}} game covers|{{PAGENAME}}]] {{#if:{{{2|}}}|[[Category:{{{2}}} game covers|{{PAGENAME}}]]|}} {{#if:{{{3|}}}|[[Category:{{{3}}} game covers|{{PAGENAME}}]]|}} }}} ==See also== *{{tl|game rationale}} [[Category:Non-free image copyright tags|{{PAGENAME}}]] [[Category:Video game media templates|{{PAGENAME}}]] [[Category:Templates using ParserFunctions|{{PAGENAME}}]] [[ar:قالب:غلاف لعبة]] [[pt:Predefinição:Fair Use em imagens de video games]] [[ru:Шаблон:Обложка компьютерной игры]] [[sl:Predloga:Naslovnica igre]] [[sr:Шаблон:Омот игрице]] [[vi:Tiêu bản:Bìa trò chơi điện tử]] [[zh:Template:Gamecover]]

revision.comment: move notes to documentation, outside the full protection
revision.text:
{{mergefrom|Fair use media rationale}} {| summary="The fair use rationale of this image." class="toccolours" style="width: 100%" cellpadding="2" ! colspan=2 style="background: #d8e0ff; text-align: center; vertical-align: top; padding-right: 0.4em; width: 15%; font-size: 12pt" id="rationale_header" |Non-free / fair use media [[Wikipedia:Fair use rationale guideline|rationale]] {{#if:{{{Special_header|}}}| {{{Special_header}}}|}}{{#if:{{{Article|}}}|{{#ifexist:{{{Article|}}}|for [[{{{Article}}}]] [[Category:Non-free images with valid backlink|{{PAGENAME}}]]|''- WARNING: {{{Article}}} DOES NOT EXIST''
Check capitalisation and enter only the exact name (title) of ''a single article'' with no additional formatting. It is also possible the indicated article was deleted.
[[Category:Non-free images with red backlink|{{PAGENAME}}]]}}|''- NEEDS ARTICLE NAME'' [[Category:Non-free images lacking article backlink|{{PAGENAME}}]]}}
Please read [[Wikipedia:Fair use rationale guideline]] before using this template.
 |- ! style="background: #ccf; text-align: right; vertical-align: center; padding-right: 0.4em; width: 15%" id="rationale_desc" |Description | {{{Description}}} |- ! style="background: #ccf; text-align: right; vertical-align: center; padding-right: 0.4em" id="rationale_src" | Source | {{{Source}}}{{#if:{{{Source|}}}|{{{Source}}}|[[Category:Images without source|*]] '''No source specified. Please edit this image description and provide a source.'''}} |- ! style="background: #ccf; text-align: right; vertical-align: center; padding-right: 0.4em" id="rationale_art" | Article | [[{{{Article}}}]] |- ! style="background: #ccf; text-align: right; vertical-align: center; padding-right: 0.4em; white-space: nowrap" id="rationale_port" | [[Template:Non-free use rationale#note-portion|Portion used]] | {{{Portion}}} |- ! style="background: #ccf; text-align: right; vertical-align: center; padding-right: 0.4em; white-space: nowrap" id="rationale_reduc" | [[Template:Non-free use rationale#note-resolution|Low resolution?]] | {{{Resolution|{{{Low_resolution}}}}}} |- ! style="background: #ccf; text-align: right; vertical-align: center; padding-right: 0.4em; white-space: nowrap" id="rationale_purp" | [[Template:Non-free use rationale#note-purpose|Purpose of use]] | {{{Purpose}}}{{#if:{{{Purpose|}}}|{{{Purpose}}}|'''No purpose specified. Please edit this image description and provide a purpose.'''[[Category:Images that transclude the Non-free media rationale template with no Purpose specified]]}} |- ! style="background: #ccf; text-align: right; vertical-align: center; padding-right: 0.4em; white-space: nowrap" id="rationale_repl" | [[Template:Non-free use rationale#note-replace|Replaceable?]] | {{{Replaceability}}} {{#switch: {{{other_information|}}} | - =# . # Significance. Non-free content is used only if its presence would significantly increase readers' understanding of the topic, and its omission would be detrimental to that understanding. Non-free media files are not used if they can be replaced by text that serves a similar function. | none = | = | #default = [[Template:Non-free use rationale#note-other|Other information]] {{{other_information}}} (optional)}} |}{{Non-free media}} {{pp-template|small=yes}} {{template doc}}
